justification: Vendor 2 details 'real-time alerting and notification capabilities,' 'role-based notifications,' and 'condition-based alerts,' supporting the ability to display and manage alerts and notifications. However, management of 'message queues,' 'triggers,' or in-depth control/management features are not explicitly confirmed, lowering confidence in full coverage.
ability: The ability to display and manage alerts, messages, message queues, triggers, and notifications
